multiplechoiceresponse.p: In the Maps app, add a boundary layer for districts in Trainingland, a thematic layer for the indicator “COVID-19 - Recovery rate (%)” for 2021 in the districts of Trainingland and set the classification as equal counts.

label.h3: How many districts fall into the 24.6 - 25 range for COVID-19 recovery?

div.p: In this example, 2 districts (Dessert District and Fruit District) fall into the 24.6 - 25 range seen in the map legend on the left-hand side of the map. The names of the districts can be found by hovering over the locations in the map or by adding labels in the boundary layer.
